labels.name: epic
labels.value: TC_55!048 | Applied filters 'Region/Sectors' are not displayed after selecting an item from the 'Most traded' dropdown in the 'Live shares prices'  widget on the 'Shares' page

items.statusDetails:
Failed: Bug # 55!048 Expected result: Applied filters 'Region/Sectors': ['Irland', 'Philippinen', 'Schweiz', 'Finanzwerte', 'Industriewerte'] 
are not displayed after selecting item 'Most traded' from the dropdown, 
only filters are displayed: ['Irland', 'Philippinen']

Failed: Bug # 55!048 Expected result: Applied filters 'Region/Sectors': ['Großbritannien', 'Italien', 'Vereinigte Staaten von Amerika', 'Grundstoffe', 'Energie'] 
are not displayed after selecting item 'Most traded' from the dropdown, 
only filters are displayed: ['Großbritannien', 'Italien', 'Vereinigte Staaten von Amerika']
AssertionError: Button [Accept all cookies] is not visible after 30 sec.

Failed: Bug # 55!048 Expected result: Applied filters 'Region/Sectors': ['Großbritannien', 'Hongkong', 'Spanien', 'Gesundheitswesen', 'Telekommunikation Dienstleistungen'] 
are not displayed after selecting item 'Most traded' from the dropdown, 
only filters are displayed: ['Großbritannien', 'Hongkong']

Failed: Bug # 55!048 Expected result: Applied filters 'Region/Sectors': ['Deutschland', 'Großbritannien', 'Hongkong', 'ETFs', 'Versorgungsbetriebe'] 
are not displayed after selecting item 'Most traded' from the dropdown, 
only filters are displayed: ['Deutschland', 'Großbritannien', 'Hongkong', 'ETFs']

Failed: Bug # 55!048 Expected result: Applied filters 'Region/Sectors': ['Kanada', 'Philippinen', 'Vereinigte Staaten von Amerika', 'ETFs', 'Technologie'] 
are not displayed after selecting item 'Most traded' from the dropdown, 
only filters are displayed: ['Kanada', 'Philippinen', 'Vereinigte Staaten von Amerika']
